content: What popular board game involves buying and trading properties, and has versions based on cities around the world?

The popular board game you're referring to is Monopoly. It involves players rolling dice to move around the game board, buying and trading properties, and developing their properties with houses and hotels with the goal of driving their opponents into bankruptcy. There are indeed many international versions of Monopoly, each based on different cities and countries around the world, allowing players to experience the game with local landmarks, currencies, and themes.
